hymn.title: I can read the Bible
hymn.chords: | Dm - G - | C - C/E - | G - G7 - | C - - - | Dm - G - | Am - C/E - | Dm - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: I can read the Bi -- ble! I can pray! Oh, I can praise the Lord! Yes, I can sing to Him! I can read the Bi -- ble! I can pray! And I can give my heart to Him!

lyrics.stanza: I can read the Bible! I can pray! Oh, I can praise the Lord! Yes, I can sing to Him! I can read the Bible! I can pray! And I can give my heart to Him!
